original_text: And I sent the hornet before you, which drove them out before you, the two kings of the Amorites; it was not by your sword or by your bow.
korean_text: 내가 왕벌을 너희 앞에 보내어 그 아모리 족속의 두 왕을 너희 앞에서 쫓아내게 하였나니 너희의 칼이나 너희의 활로써 이같이 한 것이 아니며

sentences.original_text: And I sent the hornet before you
which drove them out before you
the two kings of the Amorites
it was not by your sword
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희 칼로 한 것이 아니요
